Question: SK hynix CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
SK hynix

Product: HBM3E Memory Solutions

- Industry-leading AI solutions
- Groundbreaking memory solutions, including HBM3E
- HBM3E offers 1.18TB/s data processing speed
- 1.3 times faster than HBM3 and 1.4 times more data capacity
- 10% improvement in heat dissipation with Advanced MR-MUF technology
- Compute Express Link (CXL) interface
- Test Computational Memory Solution (CMS) product
- Accelerator-in-Memory based Accelerator (AiMX)
- AI fortune teller with generative AI technology
- Future vision for memory-centric AGI era
- Developing HBM4 and HBM4E
- Custom memory platform in development
Summary_cn:
SK海力士

产品：HBM3E内存解决方案

- 行业领先的人工智能解决方案
- 开创性的内存解决方案，包括HBM3E
- HBM3E提供1.18TB/s的数据处理速度
- 比HBM3快1.3倍，数据容量增加1.4倍
- 具备先进的MR-MUF技术，散热性能提升10%
- 计算快速连接（CXL）接口
- 测试计算内存解决方案（CMS）产品
- 基于内存的加速器（AiMX）
- 采用生成式人工智能技术的AI占卜师
- 面向以内存为中心的AGI时代的未来愿景
- 正在开发HBM4和HBM4E
- 开发中的定制内存平台
